original_title: Trump says hostages will return only when Hamas is 'confronted and destroyed'  | Fox News
article_summary: Thousands of Israelis protest for an end to the Israel-Hamas war and the return of remaining hostages. President Trump calls for Hamas to be "confronted and destroyed" before hostages are returned, and a new ceasefire proposal is being discussed by Arab mediators, but Israel has not yet approved it.</s>
